jade.misc

Class JADEPlatformTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.misc.JADEPlatformTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public class JADEPlatformTest
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.rmi.Remote
    A simple class to test for the existence of a JADE platform. This class can be used as an application (on the command line) or also used by an external application.
    Author:
    Stelios Gerogiannakis, (c) Archetypon S.A. 2002, Project Onto-Logging

      • isRMIRunning

        public static java.lang.String isRMIRunning(java.lang.String host,
                                            java.lang.String port)
        Checks if the RMI registry exists on the given host.
        Parameters:
        host - the fully qualified machine name or IP; leave null for localhost
        port - where RMI is listening; leave null for default
        Returns:
        String null if all went well, an error message if not
